mapper.select: SELECT REG_DATE, ST_NAME, STATUS, FINAL_DATE FROM ( SELECT RA.REG_DATE, IA.ST_NAME, CASE WHEN RA.ADMIN_READ_DATE IS NULL AND RP.FINAL_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN '미확인' WHEN RA.ADMIN_READ_DATE IS NOT NULL AND RP.FINAL_DATE IS NULL THEN '처리중' ELSE '처리완료' END AS STATUS, RP.FINAL_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RA.REG_DATE DESC) AS rnum FROM REQ_APPLY RA JOIN ST_CHBOX SC ON RA.ST_CHBOX_NUM = SC.ST_CHBOX_NUM JOIN ST_LIST SL ON SC.ST_NUM = SL.ST_NUM JOIN IN_PROCESS IP ON SL.IN_PROCESS_NUM = IP.IN_PROCESS_NUM JOIN IN_APPLY IA ON IP.IN_APPLY_NUM = IA.IN_APPLY_NUM JOIN REQ_PROCESS RP ON RA.REQ_APPLY_NUM = RP.REQ_APPLY_NUM WHERE RA.USER_NUM = #{user_num} ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
